- Private Swimming Pool

On the ground floor, you're welcomed by the double ceiling entrance Foyer, which leads to the spacious living room. The living area and formal dining areas, both offering large floor to ceiling windows which open up to the stunning beach view and flood the rooms with sunlight. The kitchen is very large, and can be utilised as a lovely family space, with a maids room, laundry and storage room as well. With a closed garage for two cars, and more open parking spaces at the front of the villa.  Upstairs, you'll find four spacious ensuite bedrooms.  
The master suite and second bedroom, both offer the sea and skyline view and the third and fourth bedroom offer the large entertainment terrace.
Call Now to view this fantastic property.."]

Offering panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah, Blue Waters and that of the sea, you will indeed be having a great time here.
Further, the meticulously planned residences, inspired by Miami modernist architecture, it does go a long to present you homes with resort-style living. In a way, every aspect is planned to make you feel part of a community, where you get to access an affluent lifestyle.
Being a resident, you will get direct access to a beach. In addition to these, you will be living close to some of the best in class hotels, boutiques, restaurants, and cafes.

descriptions: ["DescriptionThis is a well maintained well laid out one bed apartment has views from the balcony of both the beautiful Saadiyat beach and views towards the city and the Louvre.Located in the St Regis hotel complex it benefits from all the hotel has to offer including out door pools, children's play areas and a state of the art members gymSaadiyat Island boasts a championship golf course, Saadiyat Beach Club, St. Regis and Park Hyatt resorts and the retail/dining arcade \x91The Collection\x92.\xa0Cranleigh, the renowned English school and the New York University are close by and the first Louvre museum outside of ParisCall Jessica Gane on +971506424755 / 800 HENRY (43679) or visit www.henrywiltshire.ae for further detailsHenry Wiltshire International - Award Winner - Most Outstanding Abu Dhabi Brokerage 2018 and 2019. Fully licensed and compliant boutique estate agency in Abu Dhabi. With offices in Abu Dhabi, London, Dublin, Hong Kong and Singapore, we offer professional sales and leasing services in Abu Dhabi and selected properties for sale in London, Europe, Indian Ocean and Asia"]
